description.value: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

The orc makes two attacks with its greataxe or its spear.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d8 + 1d12 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + 1d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage, or [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Each creature of the war chief’s choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Battle Cry gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the war chief’s next turn. The war chief can then make one attack as a bonus action.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Aggressive. As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Gruumsh’s Fury. The orc deals an extra [[/damage 1d8 average=true]] damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
